name: Stardust Demolition
description:
Destroy everything in your path!

Control a demolition monster truck to raze to the ground as much of the Space Junk Arena as you can in a minute!
The game features 3 skins, Arcade and Infinite (Playground) game modes.

Controls:
WASD movement
Mouse - demolition lever

Thank you for checking out the game!
If you have any concerns or suggestions, please email me at iaroslav.titov@gmail.com #action #sports #arcade #other
